comments.body:
If err is nil, may be use InfoS, or
```
klog.Errors(fmt.Errorf("Unexpectedly stopped receiving OOM notifications"), "")
```
Nit: It seems like this information is not only helpful as an event, but would also be great to include in logs. Do you know if all events are also logged somewhere more permanent?

there is a log printing about this:

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/2d5020e3b650c8df92e8a0a6c49426d801055eb7/pkg/kubelet/oom/oom_watcher_linux.go#L62
